DOC.brief_summary: Aim study investigate whether patient follow kidney transplantation ( > 6 month transplantation ) , intra-patient variability level tacrolimus comparable administration tacrolimus twice daily ( Prograf ) tacrolimus daily ( Advagraf ) , regimen 3 month .
